entry.data:
SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE MID 30S
NORTHWEST WINDS 10 TO 15 MPH

MOSTLY CLEAR
LOWS AROUND 19
NORTHWEST WINDS AROUND 5 MPH, BECOMING SOUTH AFTER MIDNIGHT

PARTLY SUNNY IN THE MORNING, THEN BECOMING MOSTLY CLOUDY
BREEZY AND NOT AS COOL WITH HIGHS IN THE UPPER 40S
SOUTH WINDS 15 TO 25 MPH WITH GUSTS UP TO 35 MPH

MOSTLY CLOUDY
NOT AS COOL WITH LOWS IN THE UPPER 30S
SOUTHWEST WINDS 15 TO 20 MPH WITH GUSTS UP TO 30 MPH, BECOMING WEST 5 TO 10 MPH AFTER MIDNIGHT

PARTLY SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE MID 50S
NORTHWEST WINDS AROUND 5 MPH, BECOMING SOUTHWEST IN THE AFTERNOON

MOSTLY CLOUDY
SHOWERS LIKELY AFTER MIDNIGHT
LOWS IN THE UPPER 30S
CHANCE OF RAIN 60 PERCENT

MOSTLY CLOUDY WITH A CHANCE OF SHOWERS IN THE MORNING, THEN PARTLY SUNNY IN THE AFTERNOON
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 50S
CHANCE OF RAIN 50 PERCENT

MOSTLY CLEAR
LOWS IN THE UPPER 20S

CLEAR
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 50S
LOWS IN THE UPPER 30S

PARTLY CLOUDY IN THE EVENING, THEN BECOMING MOSTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE MID 30S

PARTLY SUNNY
A CHANCE OF RAIN SHOWERS IN THE AFTERNOON
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 50S
CHANCE OF RAIN 30 PERCENT
